channel.title: CVE Feed for WatchGuard -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WatchGuard -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-5974|2024-08-01T21:25:03.188Z -- watchguard -- fireware%20os
item.description: A buffer overflow in WatchGuard Fireware OS could may allow an authenticated remote attacker with privileged management access to execute arbitrary code with system privileges on the firewall. This issue affects Fireware OS: from 11.9.6 through 12.10.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-1417|2024-08-01T18:40:21.126Z -- watchguard -- authpoint%20password%20manager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection') vulnerability in WatchGuard AuthPoint Password Manager on MacOS allows an a adversary with local access to execute code under the context of the AuthPoint Password Manager application. This issue affects AuthPoint Password Manager for MacOS versions before 1.0.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-5974|2024-07-09T14:32:08.765Z -- watchguard -- fireware%20os
item.description: A buffer overflow in WatchGuard Fireware OS could may allow an authenticated remote attacker with privileged management access to execute arbitrary code with system privileges on the firewall. This issue affects Fireware OS: from 11.9.6 through 12.10.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-1417|2024-06-04T18:00:15.158Z -- watchguard -- authpoint%20password%20manager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection') vulnerability in WatchGuard AuthPoint Password Manager on MacOS allows an a adversary with local access to execute code under the context of the AuthPoint Password Manager application. This issue affects AuthPoint Password Manager for MacOS versions before 1.0.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-4944|2024-07-09T02:23:25.039Z -- watchguard -- mobile%20vpn%20with%20ssl%20client
item.description: A local privilege escalation vlnerability in the WatchGuard Mobile VPN with SSL client on Windows enables a local user to execute arbitrary commands with elevated privileged.
